messages.title: This election is a choice
messages.content: This election is a choice between Labour fighting for hard-working families and the NHS, or five more years of Conservatives hurting the vulnerable and putting the most privileged first. Please make your vote count here in Newcastle.

leaflet.personalStatement: Newcastle born and bred. We need a strong, independent voice - an MP who's local, approachable, and with an effective track record.

images.caption: Re-Elect Paul Farrelly Labour Parliamentary Candidate

leaflet.additionalNotes: The provided image's address and barcodes have been redacted, likely for privacy reasons.
